description:
Have you been wondering what all of the "Periscope" buzz is about? Maybe you've been thinking about trying out the app yourself, but aren't really sure where to start or whether it's right for you.

This course was designed with the absolute beginner mind. We start with an overview what Periscope is and how it can be used. Then we dive straight into the technical aspects of downloading and navigating the app, creating an account, and we wrap it all up by showing you how to broadcast on Periscope.
title: Intro to Periscope Marketing
